item.title: Speaking @ IT360, April 7th, 2010
item.description: I will be speaking again at the IT360 conference in Toronto, ON, Canada in the Asterisk & Open Telephony portion of the conference. IT360 is on April 7 this year (2010) being held at the Metro Toronto Convention Centre. I will be speaking on the Super Panel â€“ Enterprise Use, Security, Virtual Hosting, Mobility & More along with John Todd, Kevin Fleming, Steve Sokol, and others. My primary focus will likely be on the large scale call centre implementations I’ve done, along with clustering, database integration, and distributed information.
